text: Vaktiyle Sultan Alaeddin Moğol istilasına karşı koyabilmek için...
english: Once upon a time, Sultan Alaeddin had
secretly prepared to resist the Mongol invasion.
The names of the brave men who would participate in this preparation he organized...
the names of our spies who had managed to infiltrate deep into Mongol territory were all meticulously recorded in the documents. It was hidden in a

text: Sarayda gizli bir yerde, gizli bir sandığın içine saklandı.
english: secret chest in a secret place in the palace .

text: Geçmiş olsun, söylerim tabii. Bir ihtiyacınız olursa...
english: I'll definitely tell him to get well soon. If you need anything...
...our church is always at your service.

text: (Bamsı) Beyim, bu saraydaki sandık neden bu kadar mühimdir?
english: (Bamsi) Bey, why is this chest in the palace so important? It's not

text: Kurtaracağımız yalnızca bir sandık değildir Bamsı.
english: just a chest we're going to save, Bamsi. The

text: ...Oğuz Ata’dan beri gelen ebet müddet devletimizin teminatıdır o.
english: the guarantee of our eternal state, which has existed since Oğuz Ata.
(Ertuğrul) For now, this much is enough for you to know.

text: Sandığa nasıl ulaşacağız beyim? Sarayın neresindedir?
english: How do we get to the ballot box, sir? Where in the palace is it located?

text: Sandığa ulaşan gizli bir geçit vardır.
english: There is a secret passage leading to the chest.
(Ertuğrul) While I'm talking to Emir Bahaddin...

text: ...siz de o gizli geçitten geçip, sandığın olduğu odaya ulaşacaksınız.
english: ...you will also pass through that secret passage and reach the room where the chest is.
(Ertuğrul) There will be someone to meet you there.
They used to be our enemies, now they are on our side. They

text: Hülagü Han vergileri bekler. Bunun tartışılacak bir tarafı yok.
english: Hulagu Khan awaits the taxes. There's no room for debate on this. I would like to discuss this matter with

text: Sultan Rükneddin Kılıçarslan’la mevzuyu istişare etmek isterim.

english: ...he granted the authority to collect taxes to the Umurid Principality.
How are you? We don't have
time to discuss these things now.

text: İyi, iyi. Hadi o vakit gizli odaya gidip sandığı alalım.
english: Good, good. Let's go to the secret room and get the chest then.

text: Emir Bahaddin sandığı alıp, Moğol Komutanı Kara Börü'ye teslim edecek.
english: Emir Bahaddin will take the chest and deliver it to the Mongol commander Kara Börü.
'm sure, Bamsi. We have no time to lose.

text: Bu malumatı tez Ertuğrul Bey'e iletesiniz.
english: Please relay this information to Ertuğrul Bey as soon as possible.

text: Hayrola Nea, neyin var? Neden üzgünsün?
english: What's wrong, Nea? Why are you sad?
My father isn't well, and I'm worried about him. There was

text: Bir de babamın bana hediye ettiği bir kolye vardı.
english: also a necklace my father had given me as a gift . She was

text: Onu kaybettiğim için çok üzüldü ve bana kızdı.
english: very upset and angry with me for losing him. Why would

text: Baban bir kolye kaybettiğin için sana neden kızsın ki?
english: your father be angry with you for losing a necklace ?
always told me to keep this necklace safe.

text: Ama adamlar bizi götürürken fark etmeden kolyeyi düşürmüşüm.
english: But I accidentally dropped the necklace while the men were taking us away. I wanted to

text: Gidip arayayım dedim ama bana izin vermedi.
english: go and look for him, but he wouldn't let me .
He said it was dangerous outside.
won't be safe for you outside.

text: Ben oraları avucumun içi gibi bilirim.
english: I know those places like the back of my hand.
I can bring you that necklace.

text: ...Ertuğrul Bey gelmeden sayım yapmasanız iyi olur.
english: ...It would be best if you didn't conduct the headcount before Ertuğrul Bey arrives .

text: Bunu yapmanız demek Ertuğrul Bey'i çiğnemeniz demektir.
english: do this would mean trampling on Ertuğrul Bey .

text: Bu da aramızda bir daha kapanmayacak büyük bir husumete sebep olur.
english: This will cause a great enmity between us that will never be resolved. If

text: Teokles taşıdığı sırrı tekfura verirse her şey mahvolur.
english: Teokles reveals the secret he holds to the ruler, everything will be ruined. That will

text: Teo'nun verdiği zehirle en geç yarın geberecektir.
english: He will die by tomorrow at the latest from the poison Teo gave him. It will

text: Ayrıca onun vuruşmada başına aldığı darbelerden dolayı öldüğü sanılacak.
english: also be assumed that he died from the blows to his head during the fight. What about the
they know something? They will leave the
tribe because their father has died . -We'll
kill them on the way too. -The camp is being monitored. Do

text: Merak etmeyin Komutan Dragos, obadan çıkar çıkmaz...
english: n't worry, Commander Dragos, as soon as we leave the camp
Beautiful. Now listen to me carefully.

text: Yarın Ataç Bey ve devletin vergi tahsildarları...
english: Tomorrow, Mr. Ataç and the state tax collectors
will set off towards the other settlements.

text: Siz sandığı Hülagü Han'a götürün çabuk!
english: Take the chest to Hulagu Khan quickly!
You will pay the price for everything you've done. Did you think I would let you get away with the

text: Döktüğün kanları yanına bırakır mıyım sandın?

english: I should have killed you in the palace.

text: Ama bunun bedelini yedi ceddine ödeteceğim.
english: But I will make them pay for this, seven generations of them.

text: Eğer bana bir şey yaparsanız, bunun bedelini tüm halkın...
english: If you do anything to me,

text: ...gözünün önünde öldürdüğün beylerden daha beter öder Ertuğrul.
english: Ertuğrul, you will pay a price far worse than the lords you killed in front of all the people.
My sword, sharpened with vengeance, is enough for all of you.
You will all see what happens to anyone who dares to become a leader of the Turks.
(Bamsi) Thank God we saved the chest, sir.
There's no key to open the box.

text: (Bamsı) Beyim, bu sandığı açmanın başka bir yolu yok mudur?
english: (Bamsi) Bey, isn't there another way to open this chest ?
The key is with those two spies who escaped. There are

text: İçinde çok mühim kâğıtlar vardır Bamsı.
english: very important papers inside, Bamsi. If we try

text: Eğer anahtarsız açmaya kalkarsak içindeki şişe kırılır ve bütün kâğıtlar yok olur.
english: to open it without the key, the bottle inside will break and all the papers will be lost. When
you first confessed your love to me... ...I couldn't tell you that
my heart contained only your love . Waiting all

text: Bunca zaman senden bir haber beklememe değdi.
english: this time to hear from you was worth it.

text: (Dragos) Şimdi sıra geldi pazardaki kargaşayı izlemeye.
english: (Dragos) Now it's time to watch the commotion in the market.
(Dragos) Lais, go back to the castle.
(Karabela) There's someone there! Hurry, don't miss out!
...to infiltrate their ranks and gather information.
...who do they do business with in our lands...
(Prosecutor) I'm fine, brother. Let's go before the others arrive. You're the one who set the
(Ilbilge) You didn't allow us to go to other villages . I'll chop

text: İmdi er olasın da yaptığın kahpeliği itiraf edesin.
english: Now, be a man and confess the treachery you've committed. That's enough

text: Bu dizinin betimlemesi Tekden Film tarafından...
english: The description of this series was done by Tekden Film...

text: ...bir daha bir hatuna el kaldırdığını görmeyeceğim.
english: ...I will never see you raise your hand to a woman again .

text: Bu hatun hepimize yalan söyledi baba.
english: This woman lied to all of us, Dad. It
turned out he was from the Umuroğlu family. He fooled us all. While
you were away, they raided our camp. The

text: Bana burada olan her şeyi anlatacaksınız.
english: You're going to tell me everything that happened here.

text: Artuk Bey, sen de yaralıyı alıp içeri götüresin.
english: Artuk Bey, you take the wounded man inside.

text: Arkamızda iz bırakamayız. Onu çabuk götürün buradan.
english: We cannot leave a trace behind. Get him out of here quickly.

text: Siz bu taraftan, biz de bu taraftan gideceğiz.
english: You'll go this way, and we'll go that way. Don't

text: Neden Alplerini Gündüz'ün öldürdüğünü düşünürsün hatun?
english: Why do you think Gündüz killed Alps, woman?

text: Babam Umur Bey ve Alplerimizle obana vardık.
english: My father, Umur Bey, and our Alps arrived at the encampment.

text: Devletimizin bize verdiği vazifeyi Hayme Hatun'a, Artuk Bey'e bildirdik.
english: We informed Hayme Hatun and Artuk Bey of the duty our state had assigned to us.

text: Vergi toplamak için vardığımızı işitince deliye döndüler.
english: when they heard we had come to collect taxes .

text: Gündüz Alp hançerini babamın gırtlağına dayadı.
english: Gündüz Alp held his dagger to my father's throat .
(İlbilge) Then they insulted us and kicked us out of the camp.
You arrived at the camp like Mongol marauders.

text: Baban olacak o hadsiz, sözleriyle hepimizi ezmeye kalktı.
english: That arrogant man, your father, tried to belittle us all with his words.
He attempted to enter our tent without permission.
He lunged at my grandmother. I put him in his place too

text: Bundan sonra da Gündüz gitti, Alplerini katletti, öyle mi?
english: then Gündüz left, and massacred his Alps, is that right?
...with these words, you accuse not only Gündüz...
...but also the Kayı Alps of murder .
Carefully consider where your lyrics will lead.

text: Hiçbir sır gizli kalmaz Ertuğrul Bey.
english: No secret remains hidden, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Gömersin ama bir yerden baş verir, filizlenir.
english: You bury it, but it will sprout and grow from somewhere. At

text: O vakit o kanda kimin boğulacağını kimse bilemez.
english: that time, no one knows who will drown in that blood .

text: Alpler de yanındadır. Biraz istirahat eder.
english: The Alps are nearby too. He rests for a while. When

text: Ataç Bey kendine geldiğinde onu da sorgulayacağız Artuk Bey.
english: Mr. Ataç regains consciousness, we will question him as well, Mr. Artuk.
me apply ointment to your wound.
(Grumpy sound) - In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

text: Bu olanları işitince onu nasıl durdururum bilmem.
english: When I hear about what happened, I don't know how to stop him.
He was killed in the Alps.

text: Lakin sözlerin bir şey ispat etmediği gibi, iftiraya düşersin.
english: But your words prove nothing, and you only fall into slander. Is it

text: Ataç Bey'in sırtından çıkan ok Türk okudur.
english: arrow that came out of Ataç Bey's back is a Turkish arrow.

text: Gündüz Alp de Artuk Bey de obaya geldiğimizde...
english: When we arrived at the camp, both Gündüz Alp and Artuk Bey warned us
not to go to other camps .

text: Bunlardan sonra da bu olanlar başımıza geldi.
english: then these things happened to us . If

text: Ataç Bey baskında Kayı Alplerini ya da Gündüz'ü görse...
english: Ataç Bey were to see the Kayı Alps or Gündüz during the raid...
The attackers had their faces covered.

text: Ataç Bey'in ardından atını çatlatırcasına hana girdi.
english: After Ataç Bey, he galloped into the inn, his horse almost collapsing .
What was your intention? Are you saying

text: Alplerim gibi Ataç Bey'i de öldürüp yaptığın işi yarım bırakmamak mı?
english: you'll kill Ataç Bey, just like you killed my Alps, so you don't leave your job unfinished? So
tell me, where did you come from?
...tell me, where did you come from?
Where did you come from, Gündüz?
(Breathing sound) It's a good thing you didn't

text: İyi ki o oku bırakıp teslim olmadın gardaşım.
english: drop that arrow and surrender, brother.
This scoundrel would have killed both of us. If

text: Av için ısrar etmeseydim, bunların hiçbiri başımıza gelmeyecekti abi.
english: I hadn't insisted on going hunting, none of this would have happened, man.

text: Babam bana çok kızacak. Tabii buradan sağ salim çıkabilirsek.
english: My father will be very angry with me. That is, if we can get out of here safe and sound. We
're going out, brother. We will get out of this, God willing.

text: Nereden geldiğini bile söyleyemeyen bu yalancıya inanmamı mı beklersin?
english: you expect me to believe this liar who can't even tell me where he came from?
They had a horse race! That's an absolute lie!
Gündüz and Çağrı should be thrown into prison.

text: Bu iş açığa çıkana kadar orada kalacaklar.
english: They will stay there until this whole thing is revealed.

text: Baba, hepimize yalan söyleyen, imdi de iftira atan...
english: Father, how can you act based on the words of this woman who has lied to all of us and is now slandering us

text: ...bu hatunun sözlerine bakarak nasıl hareket edersin?

english: Osman and the Prosecutor have gone to the hunting grounds.

text: Hayme ana haber göndermiştir, hâlâ dönmemişler.
english: Mother Hayme sent word, but they still haven't returned. To the

text: Avlak, Türk obalarına giden yolun üzerindedir Bamsı.
english: hunting ground is on the road leading to the Turkish settlements, Bamsı. At

text: O vakit Osman'la Savcı bu işin tam göbeğine düşmüş olabilirler beyim.
english: that point, Osman and the prosecutor might have found themselves right in the middle of this whole affair, sir.

text: Baba, müsaade et ben de seninle geleyim.
english: Father, allow me to come with you.

text: Gardaşlarımın başı beladayken suçsuz yere zindanda bekleyemem.
english: I cannot wait unjustly in prison while my brothers are in trouble.

text: Baba, etme. Baba, gardaşlarımın başı beladayken yapma baba!
english: Dad, don't do it. Dad, don't do this while my brothers are in trouble!

text: Eğer gardaşlarımın başına bir hâl gelirse...
english: If anything happens to my brothers ...
...I'll hold you accountable first, woman. Just so
Come on, man, snap out of it. Open
your eyes, brother. Come to your senses.

text: Bir hatunun iftirasına oğlunu zindana atarsın.
english: You throw your son in jail because of a woman's slander.
My brothers are nowhere to be found.
I need to get out of here.

text: Çağrı. Çağrı duramam burada. Çıkmam lazım.
english: Call. Çağrı, I can't stay here. I have to leave.
Calm down, Gündüz. You've wreaked havoc.
I will destroy the world if necessary.

text: Gardaşlarım ortada yok diyorum. Bir hatunun iftirasıyla buraya düşmüşüm.
english: I'm saying my brothers are nowhere to be found. I ended up here because of a woman's false accusation.
I deserve even less than I deserve. I

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in iradesini çiğneyip buradan çıkarsak bizi hiç affetmez, Gündüz.
english: defy Ertuğrul Bey's will and leave here, he will never forgive us, Gündüz.

text: Sen burada kalacaksın Çağrı. Ben tek başıma çıkacağım.
english: You'll stay here, Çağrı. I'll go out alone.

text: Nereye gidersin Ertuğrul Bey? Seninle konuşacaklarımız var.
english: Where are you going, Ertuğrul Bey? We have things to talk to you about. Yeah. Söğüt

english: you ensure peace and security only for yourself? Since we

text: Buraya geldik geleli başımıza gelmeyen kalmadı.

text: ...senin Alplerini ne benim oğlum Gündüz ne de Kayı Alpleri katlettiler.

I will find whoever the killers are.
Now get out of my way. Do
n't think you can save your son. Don't try to

text: Bu işin üstünü de örtmeye kalkma.

english: If the culprit isn't one of you...

text: Yoksa sizin on yılda ihya ettiğiniz bu Söğüt’ü…
english: Or else, I will turn this Söğüt, which you have revived in ten years, into a
graveyard for all of you in ten days.
…whoever wanted to take us to the grave …
…now lies in the grave they dug.

text: Kötü söz döner, sahibinin başını keser, iyi belle.
english: Bad words can come back to haunt you; remember that well.
I attribute these words to your pain and your anger.
I am the lord of this land. I'm the one who finds

text: Suçluları ben bulurum, hesaplarını da ben keserim.
english: the criminals, and I'm the one who holds them accountable.

text: İmdi kenarda bir yerde bekleyin, kendi işinizi yapın.
english: Now, just stand aside and do your own thing.
Don't get in the way. Let
We'll see, Mr. Ertuğrul, we'll see.

text: Bizden uzak tutmak için zindana attılar.
english: They threw him in prison to keep him away from us.
You will bring him to me. I'll

text: Olmaz. Ertuğrul Bey’in kesin buyruğu var.
english: Impossible. Ertuğrul Bey has given a definite order.

text: Ne edersin Gündüz Alp? Gündüz yapma, Gündüz.
english: What are you doing, Gündüz Alp? Don't do it during the day, don't do it during the day.
If I said I'm going to leave, I'm going to leave.

text: Beni müşkül durumda bırakırsın Gündüz Alp.
english: You'll put me in a difficult situation, Gündüz Alp. I'm
not going to do anything to you.
You're going to get yourself into trouble, Gündüz. Is
Çağrı more important than my brothers?

text: Emir Bahaddin bize saldıranların kim olduğunu öğrenmeli.
english: Emir Bahaddin must find out who attacked us.

text: Eğer öğrenemezse Hülagü Han onu da kazağa vurur.
english: If he doesn't learn, Hulagu Khan will also put him in a coffin.
Don't forget, the ballot box slipped away from our grasp. He
-What's happening? It's him. -I don't understand. I don't know.
(Sound of an arrow being fired) (Groaning sound)
One is Nöger, who is the other one?

text: Ben Hülagü Han’ın Türk obalarındaki casusuyum.
english: I am Hulagu Khan's spy among the Turkic tribes.

text: Arkadan gelenler var. Tez buradan gitmeliyiz.
english: There are more coming from behind. We need to leave here immediately. They are

text: Çok kalabalıklar. Komutan Börçigin, tez gitmeliyiz.
english: very crowded. Commander Borchigin, we must leave quickly.
What are you doing here? -Where is

text: Yerini bilsem de söylemem. Hem sana ne olur? Hadi git.
english: Even if I knew where it was, I wouldn't tell you. And what would happen to you? Go on, leave.
What do you think you're doing, woman?

text: Gündüz nerede söyle, yoksa senin için iyi olmaz.
english: Tell me where you are during the day, or it won't be good for you.

text: Ne yaparsın? Alplerini üzerime mi salarsın?
english: Whatever you do? Are you going to unleash your Alps on me? There's

english: I'll come to you on my own.

text: Soruma cevap ver. Gündüz Alp nereye gitti?
english: Answer my question. Where did Gündüz Alp go?
Gündüz Bey went to look for his brothers. Did he

text: Gardaşlarını mı aramaya gitti? Bu da yeni oyun mu?
english: go to look for his brothers? Is this a new game?

text: Ne oyunu hatun? Anahtarı benden zorla aldı...
english: What game, woman? He took the key from me by force...
...he locked me in here and left. We will hold you

text: Ettiğin her şeyin hesabını soracağız senden.

english: the prosecutor's horse. They must have

text: Atı burada bırakıp ormana dalmış olmalılar beyim.

text: Onu hemen bulmamız gerek. Hadi. Hadi.
english: need to find him immediately. Come on. Come on.
My lord, these are the Alps of the Umuroğlu family. Let's see if anyone

text: Bakın bakalım sağ kalan var mı.
Beyim, şu tarafa doğru giden ayak izleri var.
english: Sir, there are footprints leading this way.
Bamsi, assign the Alps to your duties. Let
them take the bodies of the Umuroğlu Alps away.

text: Alplar, siz tez cenazeleri toplayasınız, obalarına götüresiniz.
english: People of the Alps, you should quickly gather the dead and take them to their camps. Come on

text: Kim bunlar böyle? Hâlâ peşimizdeler mi?
english: Who are these people? Are they still after us?

text: Bunların peşinizde olduğunu görünce sizi emniyete almak için takip ettik.
english: When we saw that they were following you, we followed you to bring you to safety.
You arrived just in time, soldiers. You are a formidable warrior.

text: Komutan Börçigin, Kara Börü uçmağa vardı.
english: Commander Börçigin, Kara Börü, has passed away.

text: Bu civarlarda nerelerde eşkıyalar dolanır, nerelerde Alpler vardır iyi bilirim.
english: I know very well where the bandits roam around here, and where the Alps are. We

text: Siz varacağınız yere sağ salim ulaşana dek yanınızda olmak isteriz.
english: want to be by your side until you reach your destination safely.

text: Belli ki birileri hâlâ peşimizde olacak.
english: Clearly, someone will still be after us. It works to our advantage that

text: Bunların buraları iyi bilmeleri işimize gelir. İyi de savaşçılar.
english: they know this area well . They are good fighters, too.
Good morning my baby. Then come with us.
My lord! The tracks lead this way.
It could be Osman and the Prosecutor.
Gündüz was thrown into prison by his father.

text: Umuroğulları Alplerine baskın yapılmış. Alplerin hepsi öldürülmüş.
english: The Umuroğulları Alps were raided. Everyone in the Alps has been killed.
He was accused during the day.

text: Nasıl olur? Gündüz öyle şey yapmaz Mara.
english: How come? Mara wouldn't do something like that during the day.

text: Bu sabah Gündüz’le birlikteydik. Sen de oradaydın Mara.
english: I was with Gündüz this morning. You were there too, Mara. He
You're right, madam. This is slander.

text: Kardeşleri Osman ve Savcı da ortada yokmuş.
english: His brothers Osman and Savcı were also missing .

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Alpleri onları arıyorlar.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and his Alps are searching for them.
I went to the Söğüt market and heard about it there.
I need to be by Gündüz's side.

text: Her şeyi anlatacağım. Gündüz bugün benimle birlikteydi.
english: I'll tell you everything. Gündüz was with me today. I need to clear my name from

text: Onun üzerine yüklenen bu kara lekeyi aklamam gerek.
english: this stain that has been placed upon me .

text: Bu karışıklık içinde giderseniz her şey daha da kötü olur.
english: If you continue amidst this chaos, things will only get worse. It wouldn't be good for either of you if

text: Buluştuğunuzu öğrenirlerse ikiniz için de hiç iyi olmaz.

with the state because of what happened .

text: Üstelik, Moğolların öfkesini üstüne çekmiş bir Ertuğrul'un...
english: Moreover, Ertuğrul, having drawn the wrath of the Mongols upon himself, would
hardly be of any use even to himself.

text: Baksana, oğlu Gündüz'e bile söz geçirememekte.
english: Look, he can't even control his own son, Gündüz .
We will live out our destiny.
Ertuğrul Bey made this place rich.

text: Onun sayesinde huzurlu ve mutlu yaşadık.
english: Thanks to him, we lived a peaceful and happy life. We

text: Şimdi ilk sıkıntıda yüz çevirmek olmaz.
english: cannot turn away at the first sign of trouble.
working with the Turks in Söğüt .
And I will continue to be here. At

text: Bu gidişle seninle birlikte biz de batacağız Mikis.
english: this rate, we'll sink along with you, Mikis.

text: Artık Türklerin kayığına binerek hiçbir yere varamayız.
english: We can't get anywhere by boarding the Turks' boat anymore.
Ertuğrul Bey's boat is taking on water.
Come to me when you open your eyes. I have some

text: Belki de hepimizi bu pislikten kurtaracak bir çıkış yolu.
english: Perhaps it's a way out that will save us all from this mess . Do

text: Önce oğlu, sonra babası gırtlağıma pusatlarını dayadılar!
english: First the son, then the father, held their guns to my throat! Do

text: Merak etmeyesin, bir daha buna müsaade etmeyeceğiz.
english: n't worry, we won't allow this to happen again.
Come, I made you some soup.
Now listen to me carefully, my daughter.
Our Sultan is complaining about Ertuğrul's recklessness... ...his
lack of self-awareness. She had asked me to keep an

text: Ona göz kulak olmamı istemişti benden.
Bu yüzden obamız bu topraklara gelmeden...
english: So, before our tribe arrived in these lands ...

text: ...beni malumat toplamak için yolladın, öyle mi?
english: ...you sent me to gather information, is that right ?
...our sultan will grant me the border principality .
(Umur) I have no doubt about that.

text: Lakin ahval tahmin ettiğimden daha çetindir.
english: However, the situation is more difficult than I anticipated.

text: O topraklar ya yurdumuz olacak ya da mezarımız!
english: Those lands will either be our homeland or our graves!

text: Bu topraklar bize değil, bizi sırtımızdan vurana mezar olacak!
english: This land will be a grave not for us, but for those who stabbed us in the back!

text: Babamı bir an olsun yalnız bırakmayın.
english: Don't leave my father alone for a single moment.
-You wait inside. -As you command, Ilbilge Hatun.

text: Bil bakalım bu gece çanlar kimin için çalacak Umur Bey?
english: Guess who the bells will toll tonight, Mr. Umur?

text: Ölümün tatlı kollarına bırak kendini Umur Bey.
english: Surrender yourself to the sweet embrace of death, Mr. Umur. With your

text: Sen ölümünle bana zafer parıltısı verdin.
english: death, you gave me the gleam of victory .
Turk, I am grateful to you.
(Sound of a dagger being drawn) Ah!

text: Gece gece burada ne işin var Osman?
english: What are you doing here in the middle of the night, Osman?
How quickly you forgot what happened today.
I'm ashamed in front of you, father.

text: Bir hata ettim, lakin bin pişman oldum.
english: I made a mistake, but I deeply regret it. I would like to

text: Senden af dilemek, müsaade edersen elini öpmek isterim.
english: apologize to you and, if you allow me, kiss your hand.

text: İlbilge Hatun yanıma gelsin. Ona diyeceklerim var Abdurrahman.
english: Let İlbilge Hatun come to me. I have some things to tell him, Abdurrahman.

text: Bugün yiğit bir Alp gibi vuruştun.
english: Today you fought like a valiant warrior.
You saved your brother from death.
But don't forget... it was you who
Look, son... I know best the

text: Lakin iyi bir Alp olmak için...
english: But to be a good Alp...

text: Söz dinleyeceksin ki sözün dinlenir olsun.
english: You must obey in order for your words to be obeyed . The sword is sweet if

text: Kat kat zırhtan dönmeyince kılıç tatlı...
english: it doesn't turn back from layers of armor ...
...the state is sweet if it doesn't leave when it arrives...
...the mind is sweet if it doesn't forget what it knows.
don't forget what you know, what I've said, and my advice, Osman.
Allow me to kiss your hand.

text: Sana söylemek istediğim mühim bir mesele vardır baba.
english: an important matter I want to tell you, Dad. Come on then

text: Savcı abimle ormanda düşmandan kendimizi kollarken...
english: prosecutor brother and I were hiding from the enemy in the forest...

text: ...adamların hepsinin yüzleri kapalıydı. Lakin ben bir şey gördüm.
english: ...all the men had their faces covered. But I saw something.

text: Adamlardan bir tanesinin elinde dövme vardı.
english: One of the men had a tattoo on his hand.

text: Bu dövme sayesinde o soysuzu bulabiliriz diye düşündüm baba.
english: I thought maybe we could find that scoundrel thanks to this tattoo, Dad.
I will give instructions to the Alps.
You should keep your eyes wide open too. Keep a close eye on everyone who

text: Obaya giren çıkan, Söğüt'te iş tutan kim varsa...
english: enters or leaves the village, and everyone who does business in Söğüt ...
(Sound of door closing) Thank goodness you're back,
I was about to go look for you too.

text: Babam, Osman, Savcı neredeler Çağrı? İyiler mi?
english: Where are my father, Osman, and the prosecutor, Çağrı? Are they okay?
My father and Osman would fight against the murderers.

text: Sonra bir an her şey kayboldu.
english: Then, for a moment, everything disappeared.

text: -Ben hiçbir şey hatırlamam. -Herkes iyi, merak etme.
english: -I don't remember anything. -Everyone's fine, don't worry.
I opened my eyes, I found myself in a cave. I don't
I'll find out who they are.

text: Hele bir su ver bana. Soluklanayım.
english: Give me some water. Let me catch my breath.

text: Vereyim gardaşım. Sen geç hele şöyle.
english: I'll give it to you, brother. Come on over here.

text: Zindandan kaçtığın için baban sana çok kızgın Gündüz.
english: Your father is very angry with you for escaping from the dungeon, Gündüz.
...came to storm the prison and take you away.
Your father did what was necessary. But...
...he found out about you and Irene, my brother.

text: O gelene kadar bir şeyler yiyelim.
english: Let's eat something until he arrives.

text: Ben gideceğim yere gölgemden bile önce giderim.
english: I get to my destination even before my shadow.

text: Ben size yalnız gelin demedim mi?
english: I tell you to come alone? They were
What's your name? -Into my pocket. What does "
Mergen, who betrayed Baycu Noyan! Did you
So this person is a spy, huh?
Come in, what would you like, Mr. Ertuğrul?

text: Evvela babanın sıhhati nasıldır, onu öğrenmek isterim.
english: First, I'd like to know how your father is in health . After
after your insults, how can you expect things to be?
Leave us alone for a while, Osman. First and foremost
...your father's health is important to us.

text: Bırak Artuk Bey, Ataç Bey'le ilgilendiği gibi babanla da ilgilensin.
english: Let Artuk Bey take care of your father just as he takes care of Ataç Bey. There's
We take care of my father. Do you have anything

text: Başka söyleyecek bir şeyin var mıydı?
Gündüz'le ilgili bilmen gereken bir mevzu vardır.

english: What is it? Gündüz couldn't say where he was on the

text: Alplerinin öldürüldüğü gün Gündüz nerede olduğunu söyleyememişti.

english: But I found out where it was.
Tell me then, where was it?
That day during the day-- (Sound of a door opening)

text: Hay canım babam! Kim kıydı sana?
english: Oh my dear father! Who did this to you?
My father! Wake up, Dad! Oh God!

text: Kızın İlbilge geldi babam, aç gözlerini!
english: Your daughter İlbilge has arrived, Father, open your eyes! My
...he was both a mother and a father to us.
only mountain I could lean on. My
...I will find him and kill him!
I will make the heavens a narrow place for him!
-(İlbilge) Gündüz Alp! -(Day) They will cooperate with the Mongols and...
This is your son Gündüz's dagger.
If my son is the killer...

text: ...onun kellesini kendi ellerimle veririm sana hatun.
english: ...I'll give you his head with my own hands, woman. Even

text: Gayrı oğlun Gündüz'ün canı da yetmez.
english: your son Gündüz's life won't be enough anymore. We will make

text: Tüm Kayılara, tüm Söğüt'e kan kusturacağız!
english: all the Kayı tribes, all of Söğüt, vomit blood !
